segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is a disaster with water wasting all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's blasting away, filling the sink until it spills out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring down the cabinets—such a sloppy mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just standing there, foot in the puddle, drying a plate like an idiot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, probably dirty from earlier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are making it worse, climbing for cookies on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's hand deep in the jar, crumbs likely falling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's waiting greedily; this whole thing is so unsanitary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's slippery now—gross potential for slips and falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the open window can't air out this chaos properly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks clean, but inside it's all neglect and filth building up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this careless, wasteful scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
